articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Kwang Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Kwang Ho
						
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Saturday sent a wreath to the bier of the late Ri Kwang Ho, former director of the Department of Science and Education of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Ri Kwang Ho Dies
articles.content:
Ri Kwang Ho Dies
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Kwang Ho, former director of the Department of Science and Education of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, died of hepatoma at the age of 50 Friday.
					 His obituary was issued by the C.C., the WPK and the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK Friday.
					
					 According to the obituary, Ri was a revolutionary who remained faithful to the WPK as he devoted his all to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the leadership of the party and the leader.
					
					 Ri dedicated all his wisdom and energy to developing the country's science and technology working as vice-president and president of the State Academy of Sciences for years. He made a great contribution to thoroughly implementing the party's policy of science and education and effecting a signal turn in building a thriving nation holding the important post of director of the above-said department in recent years. 
					
					 He was elected deputy to the SPA since the 10th SPA in Juche 87 (1998) and received lots of official commendation including the Order of the National Flag 1st Class in recognition of his services for the homeland and the revolution.
					
					 The feats performed by him before the party and the revolution, the country and the people will remain long, the obituary said.

articles.title: Japanese Aggression Forces Warned of Their Aerial Espionage against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Aggression Forces Warned of Their Aerial Espionage against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) --The air force of the Korean People's Army will not tolerate even a bit the aerial espionage by the warmongers of the Japanese aggression forces but mercilessly shoot down any plane intruding into the territorial air of the DPRK even 0.001 mm. This warning was served by the said Command of the KPA in a report issued Saturday. 
					 An E-767 made a long shuttle flight from air above the waters east of Wonsan to the air above the waters east of Musudan after taking off its base in Japan about 08:30 a.m. on June 25 to perpetrate aerial surveillance and radar against the coastal areas and those in the depth of the DPRK.
					
					 Similar aerial espionage was committed on June 24. 
					
					  The report said:
					
					 Japan perpetrated itself aerial espionage against the DPRK after taking the lead in prodding the UNSC into producing a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in collusion with its American master over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test. This is one more unpardonable military provocation to it. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that Japan committed aerial espionage against the DPRK at a time when the Japanese warmongers are becoming increasingly vocal about "acquisition of the capability to attack enemy bases" and "preemptive attack on the nuclear and missile bases of north Korea."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better stop going reckless, warned the report.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppets' Move to Participate in U.S.-led Cyber Storm Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppets' Move to Participate in U.S.-led Cyber Storm Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppets are contemplating participating in the U.S.-led joint exercises for fighting "cyber warfare." A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Saturday denouncing this:
					 The south Korean puppets have openly disclosed their plan to participate in the U.S.-led Cyber Storm joint exercises for aggression while spreading a story about "attack" from the DPRK these days.
					
					 This biannual exercises staged by the U.S. Department of Homeland Security from 2006 involve more than 100 government organs and at least 40 non-governmental enterprises in the U.S. as well as Britain, New Zealand, Canada and Australia at present. It is said that Japan will also take part in them in the future.
					
					 Through these exercises the U.S. seeks to develop the "weapons for cyber attack" and round off a "plan for cyber warfare" for mounting preemptive attacks on the anti-U.S. and independent countries.
					
					 The south Korean puppets' attempt to participate in the exercises is another intolerable provocation as it revealed their ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the puppets are kicking up a noisy racket to hurt the DPRK in a bid to serve the sinister purpose of justifying their participation in the exercises.
					
					 The "Defense Security Command" of the puppet army and die-hard conservative media are spreading wild rumor that the number of cyber attacks on the puppet army has increased more than 20 percent as against last year and most of them were made by the north. They are also floating misinformation that "the north operates a unit exclusively in charge of cyber warfare" and the "north comes first in Internet hacking."
					
					 The puppet Intelligence Agency, too, is asserting the need to counter it in cooperation with the U.S. while talking about the "threat of cyber attack" of someone.
					
					 As universally recognized, the U.S. is the kingpin of "cyber attack" and "hacker intrusion" on our planet and south Korea is not an exception.
					
					 The puppets already conducted the DPRK-targeted "cyber attack" during the joint war exercises staged under various codenames including Ulji Freedom Guardian with many computer experts involved.
					
					 This being a hard reality, they are mulling participating in the Cyber Storm with the U.S., under the absurd pretext of "cyber attack" from the DPRK. This only proves that they are pro-U.S. war maniacs and confrontational elements keen to ignite a war on this land in collusion with outsiders at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready for any form of high-tech war.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's reckless smear campaign and war moves against the DPRK will only precipitate its destruction.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Media Persons and Teachers Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Media Persons and Teachers Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Some time ago the south Korean puppet prosecution brought the groundless charge of "false reporting" against reporters of MBC who laid bare the sycophantic and unpopular nature of the import of American beef infected with mad cow disease pushed forward by the Lee Myung Bak group and even gentries of the "Chongwadae" and the "Grand National Party" are pressurizing the management side of MBC to step down.
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Ministry of Education and Science and Technology is threatening to take disciplinary measures and indict the teachers under the south Korean Teachers Union for the mere reason that they issued a declaration on the situation in protest against the undemocratic educational policy and suppression of the reunification-oriented education enforced by the group of traitors, talking about "illegal acts" and "strict measures".
					
					 A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in a statement issued on June 26 vehemently denounced this as an intolerable challenge and an outrageous fascist action against the south Korean people desirous of new independent and democratic politics and life.
					
					 The Lee group started its rule by shipping into south Korea the above-said beef to threaten the lives of south Koreans, established a fascist dictatorial system while brutally suppressing their just candlelight demonstrations, reduced the historic North-South declarations to dead papers and threw those who call for the unity and reunification of the nation behind bars, thereby bringing their anti-reunification nature into light, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The movement for issuing declarations on the situation mounting in south Korea is an eruption of curse and anger of people at the reality in which there is no way to achieve independence and democracy and reunification and a stern punishment meted out to the group. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the group is not yet awakened but falsifying the truth, terming the struggle of the south Korean people "an action to create social disorder" and "an illegal act".
					
					 The reality clearly proves once again that there is neither progress of south Korean society nor way to improve the people's living nor hope for reunification as long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Revise "Law on Natural Parks" under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Revise "Law on Natural Parks" under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea in a statement issued on June 27 vehemently denounced the evermore undisguised moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to revise the "law on natural parks" as another grave criminal act to reject Buddhism and do enormous harm to holy seminaries. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The group's proposal for revising the above-said law is aimed at easing the rules on the "national parks."  
					
					In case it takes effect, a large area of land belonging to temples inside parks will be reduced to a lever for business of enterprises, damaging the spheres of the traditional Buddhist activities of the south Korean Buddhist circle. 
					
					 The said moves are another expression of the religious discrimination of those seized with the conception of extreme phobia about Buddhism, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 Traitor Lee has rejected Buddhism, defiling and suppressing it whenever an opportunity presented itself. 
					
					 The group insulted Buddhists as mobs, absurdly asserting that the bamboos obtained by them for a funeral service for former President Roh Moo Hyun were for violence.
					
					 The political situation in south Korea has been driven into confusion due to the ceaseless announcement of declarations on the situation by public circles. In spite of this, this group is persistently seeking to revise the law which is bound to do tremendous harm to the temples. 
					
					 Religious discrimination and all sorts of unpopular rule will persist so long as such pseudo superior priest of Church as Lee who trumpeted he would "dedicate Seoul City to God" stays in the presidential office. 
					
					 The statement expressed expectation and belief that the south Korean Buddhist orders and organizations would closely unite with the people of different strata and turn out as one in the just struggle to put an end to the religious discrimination of the group and its all evil policies that have driven the people's living into destitution.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A friendly delegation of Jilin Yuwen Middle School of China led by Secretary of Party Committee Wang Yong arrived here today by air.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held to Mark Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held to Mark Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies were held in the capitals of North and South Phyongan provinces, Jagang, South Hwanghae, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces on June 25 and 26 on the occasion of "June 25, the day of the struggle against U.S. imperialism."
					 Present at the mass rallies were leading officials of the local party and power organs, working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students. 
					
					 Speakers said at the rallies that the U.S. ignited a war of aggression to destroy the young DPRK in its cradle on June 25, 1950 and hurled into it huge armed forces equipped with modern weapons, the south Korean puppet army and mercenaries of its 15 satellite countries, reducing everything on this land to ashes and killing Koreans in cold-blood. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK under the wise commandership of Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, honorably protecting the sovereignty of the nation and the gains of the revolution and fully demonstrating the invincible might of the heroic Korean people, they said, and went on:
					
					 Instead of drawing a lesson from the defeat the U.S. sustained in the last Korean war, it has persistently pursued its hostile policy towards the DPRK for more than half a century and seriously threatened peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. has become evermore frantic in its moves to ignite a new war.
					
					 At the present stage where the army and people of the DPRK are standing in all-out confrontation with the U.S. they will counter "sanctions" with retaliation and all-out war with all-out war in order to protect the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 They called for bringing about miracles and innovations in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation in the 150-day campaign, holding high the torches for effecting a new great revolutionary surge, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, and carrying on the vigorous struggle to achieve a final victory in the anti-U.S. confrontation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Fascist Nexus with Ultra-Right Conservative Forces Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Fascist Nexus with Ultra-Right Conservative Forces Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak held a "meeting" after inviting the representative of the "Grand National Party" and the president of the " Liberal Progress Party" to "Chongwadae" allegedly to brief them on the results of his U.S. junket. He was reported to have let loose a spate of self-praises of his humiliating and treacherous junket and called for "reaching a consensus on views" in the political camp and "supra-partisan cooperation" in the efforts to weather the present crisis in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The so-called "meeting at Chongwadae" was no more than a fascist collusion and nexus to knock together ultra-right conservative forces in a bid to mercilessly crack down upon the people from all walks of life in their struggle for justice, progress and democracy of the south Korean society and national reunification and thus tide over the group of traitors' extreme ruling crisis. 
					
					 The fascist dictatorial rule pursued by the Lee group going against the will and interests of the people in south Korea is causing its ruling crisis to fester with each passing day, the commentary observes, and goes on:
					
					 Lee keen to seek a way to get rid of the uncontrollable uneasiness and horror is disclosing his sinister intention to brutally suppress the massive struggle of the south Korean people, while working hard to strengthen the dictatorial system enforced under the signboard of "pragmatism" by rallying ultra-right conservative forces at odds and relying on their zealous backing. 
					
					 In order to put such fascist scenario into practice Lee invited traitors Pak Hui Thae and Ri Hoe Chang representing the pro-U.S. conservative forces to the "Chongwadae" in an effort to solicit "supra-partisan cooperation".
					
					 His foolish gesture would only result in raising the vigilance of the popular masses and giving momentum to the anti-"government" struggle. With no artifice can Lee escape his miserable fate already sealed, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Figures Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Figures Flailed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The "Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee for Coping with Suppression of Pomminryon (Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification)" in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 24 denouncing the puppet Lee Myung Bak regime for its frantic suppression under the pretext of security.
					 A press release read out at the press conference accused the prosecution of announcing the results of investigation into members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon in which it branded the director of its Secretariat as a "spy" and held the organization "chiefly accountable for agitating people to endanger the security".
					
					 It held that the prosecution's reckless act of incriminating the struggle for national cooperation, withdrawal of the U.S. forces and national reunification only confirms the validity of the activities of the organization.
					
					 It demanded the prosecution stop at once the criminal act of branding as "criminals" those people who devoted themselves to the patriotic movement for reunification by invoking the fascist law.
					
					 Stressing the need to put an end to the Lee Myung Bak regime's racket for "regaining the lost decade" and "purging left-wing elements" at an early date, the press release declared the organization would bring down the fascist rule enforced by the "National Security Law" and force dictator Lee Myung Bak to step down.

articles.title: GNP's Self-Opinionated Move Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
GNP's Self-Opinionated Move Rejected in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea released a statement on June 23 demanding the "Grand National Party" awaken from dictators' dream, stop its self-opinionated behavior and disband itself.
					 Accusing the GNP of having announced that it would open the session of the "National Assembly" next week single-handedly and railroad "Lee Myung Bak evil bills" through it, the statement declared that the solidarity was just stunned by this undisguised and self-opinionated behavior.
					
					 It charged the bills to be cleared by the ruling party do not reflect the demands of all the people at all but are designated to grant privileges to big businessmen only.
					
					 A lawmaker from the GNP openly called for clearing the "Lee Myung Bak evil bills" even without conducting an opinion poll as lawmakers do not know about them properly and it is hard for people to understand them, the statement noted, querying how they are going to pass the "bills" which they do not know and people are hardly aware of them.
					
					 The statement said that in a nutshell, the above-said "bills" are for the regime and the ultra-right conservative forces, not for the people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Roll Back Unpopular Educational Policy in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Roll Back Unpopular Educational Policy in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Council of Representatives of Students of Teachers' Colleges in south Korea on June 24 published a declaration on the situation denouncing the puppet group of traitors' unpopular educational policy.
					 Social democracy has been ruthlessly violated and the freedom of speech, press, assembly and association trampled down since the appearance of the Lee Myung Bak "government," the declaration deplored, adding:
					
					Students and their parents are suffering misfortune and pain and the children of the poor families are denied the right to learning due to the unpopular educational policy of the Lee regime, in particular.
					
					 It lashed out at the Lee regime for turning its face away from this reality and ignoring the people.
					
					 It demanded the Lee regime and the "Grand National Party" make an apology to the people for having driven the south Korean society into a crisis and roll back the neo-liberal educational policy.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings, round-table talks, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Russia, France, Switzerland and Libya between June 3 and 18 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 On display in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos showing their immortal exploits of  Songun leadership and books and photos introducing the army and people of the DPRK in the struggle to accelerate the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation, holding high the torch of a new great revolutionary surge.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages in the political and public circles and members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people including representatives of political parties of different countries in Cuba, members of a delegation of the Maritime Territory Branch of the "United Russia" Party and the Maritime Territory Branch of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the mayor and the deputy mayor of Nakhodka, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League, the chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the general secretary of the Association of Advocates of African Unity in Libya.
					
					 On hand were officials of the DPRK missions.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as the "Answer of Korea."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership Exploits Lauded
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Political figures of a regional organization and Tunisia released statements on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The director for Political Affairs and International Relations of the Pan-African Movement in a statement on June 16 stressed that Kim Jong Il made sure that the Juche idea was firmly held fast to as a guiding idea of the Party since the first period of his start of work at the C.C., WPK, thus achieving the steel-like unity and cohesion of the party members and leading the revolutionary cause of the Korean people to victory.
					
					 The statement noted that the Korean people are wining victory after victory in the confrontation with the imperialists thanks to the steadfast stand and the experienced leadership of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The vice secretary general in charge of information of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia in a statement on June 14 said that he looked back on the course of the protracted struggle waged by the WPK winning victories only under the leadership of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the significant day, expressing solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A film show, a lecture and a book, photo and handcrafts exhibition were held in Brazil and book, photo and handcrafts exhibitions in Guinea and Bulgaria from June 5 to 20 to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Moasir Roberto, chairman of the Brazilian Trade Unions Center of the Field of Tourism and Hotel, said that Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into the most tested and experienced revolutionary party in the world, firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation with his outstanding Songun politics and wisely led the Korean people in their struggle to build a great prosperous powerful nation and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, said that the exhibition provided an opportunity to know better about the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by wisely leading the party, army and people of the DPRK, the heroic fighting spirit being displayed by the Korean people under his leadership and the development of Songun Korea. 
					
					 The mayor of Pravets City of Bulgaria spoke highly of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, noting that the successes gained by the DPRK would be unthinkable without his exploits. 
					
					 Participants of the film show appreciated the Korean film "The answer of the DPRK."
					
					A DPRK book, photo and handcraft exhibition was held in Vientiane from June 18 to 25 to mark the above-said anniversary and the 35th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Laos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Studied in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Studied in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a reading session on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" took place in Guinea and Uganda and a reading session on his work "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" in Ethiopia between June 11 and 17 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It was stressed at the functions that Kim Jong Il in his work clarified that it is truth proved by history that socialism emerges victorious when one takes firm hold on ideology but goes to ruin when one fails to do so.
					
					 It was also mentioned there that the world socialist movement is sure to win thanks to the struggle of the popular masses who are awakened with the socialist idea and united guided by it and that the Korean people have firmly defended socialism and made steady victorious progress despite the vicious moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in booklet by Khabarovskaya Krayebaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that preserving the Juche character and national character of revolution and construction serves as a fundamental principle to be maintained to accomplish the  socialist cause and tasks and ways for its materialization.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Off Press in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Off Press in Romania
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Japanese Revolution Vol. 7 of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" (continuing edition) Part 1 was brought out by the Romanian Rotarimond Publishing House.
					 The preface of the reminiscences says that the publishing house has the honor to publish this book dealing with the whole life of a great man and outstanding statesman, in reverence for Kim Il Sung who always lives in the hearts of the world people as he performed undying feats in the human cause of independence.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the head office of the Romanian Socialist Union Party on June 19.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, manager of the publishing house who is chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union Party, said in his speech at the ceremony that the reminiscences serves as a precious textbook to be read by all Romanians as it tells how deeply Kim Il Sung loved the people and pioneered the socialist cause, undergoing all sorts of hardships and sufferings.
					
					 The great politics of the DPRK which protects socialism and firmly defends the dignity and sovereignty of the nation is based on the President's idea contained in the reminiscences.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Centenary of Birth to Be Commemorated in Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Centenary of Birth to Be Commemorated in Thailand 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed with due ceremony on May 29.
					 The chairman of the Nakhon Phathom City Council of Nakhon Phathom Province and the chairman of the Nakhon Phathom Branch of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to commemorate the centenary of his birth.

articles.title: Fuerzas Aereas del EPC advierten a los belicistas japoneses
articles.content:
Fuerzas Aereas del EPC advierten a los belicistas japoneses
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ATCC) -- Las Fuerzas Aereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea no perdonaran ni en lo minimo el espionaje aereo de los belicistas del ejercito agresor de Japon y ametrallaran sin piedad cualquier avion de ellos que se atreva a invadir, aunque 0.001mm, nuestro espacio aereo jurisdiccional.
					  Asi advirtio la Comandancia de las Fuerzas Aereas del EPC en su informacion publicada este sabado.
					
					  A eso de las 8 y 30 minutos del dia 25, el avion de mando "E-767" procedente de la base en Japon realizo por largo tiempo el vuelo de ida y vuelta desde el firmamento sobre el mar al este de Wonsan hasta el cielo sobre las aguas maritimas al este de Musudan vigilando las costas y las zonas en la profundidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y detectando las ondas radioelectricas, comienza el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Tal espionaje aereo se reporto tambien el dia 24.
					
					  Resulta otra imperdonable provocacion militar el hecho de que procedio directamente al espionaje aereo anti-RPDC ese pais isleno que tomo la delantera en fabricar en contubernio con su amo norteamericano la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC en el escenario de la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos y la prueba nuclear.
					
					  Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que tal acto hostil se cometio justamente cuando los belicistas japoneses pronuncian sin escrupulos los discursos agresivos como "poseer la capacidad de atacar bases enemigas" y "atacar preventivamente las bases nucleares y de misiles del Norte de Corea".
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: CRPP condena Sur de Corea tendente a participar en "Cyber Storm"
articles.content:
CRPP condena Sur de Corea tendente a participar en "Cyber Storm"
  Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ATCC) -- Con relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos intentan participar en un ejercicio conjunto auspiciado por Estados Unidos para hacer frente a la "guerra cibernetica", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo este sabado a la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea las siguientes declaraciones:
					  Ultimamente, los titeres surcoreanos exponen abiertamente su intento de participar en el agresivo ejercicio conjunto "Cyber Storm", que se realizara bajo el liderazgo de EE.UU., difundiendo el rumor del supuesto "ataque" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  En este ejercicio bienal, comenzado en 2006 por el Departamento de Seguridad de la Tierra de EE.UU., participan ahora mas de 100 organismos gubernamentales y mas de 40 empresas civiles de EE.UU. y 4 paises, especificamente, Inglaterra, Nueva Zelanda, Canada y Australia.
					
					Se conocio que Japon tambien tomara parte en ese ejercicio.
					
					  Mediante este entrenamiento, EE.UU. maniobra desesperadamente para desarrollar las "armas para el ataque cibernetico" y perfeccionar el "plan de la guerra cibernetica" con vistas al ataque preventivo a los paises independientes antiyanquis.
					
					  Por lo tanto, el intento de los titeres surcoreanos de participar en el deviene otro imperdonable acto provocativo que muestra su ambicion de agredir al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que ellos libran una brutal campana intrigante para calumniar a la RPDC partiendo de su siniestro intento de justificar la participacion en  "Cyber Storm".
					
					La "comandancia de la Agencia de Informacion" del ejercito titere surcoreano y los connotados medios conservadores de la prensa surcoreana difunden el rumor de que el "Norte de Corea administra una unidad especializada en la guerra cibernetica y ocupa el primer lugar en el hacking en Internet" aduciendo que se registro este ano un aumento de mas de 20 % en comparacion con el ano pasado en los atentados ciberneticos contra las tropas surcoreanas y la mayor parte de estos casos fueron ejecutados por el Norte de Corea.
					
					  El Servicio de Inteligencia titere aboga tambien por hacer frente con EE.UU. a la supuesta "amenaza de ataque cibernetico" de alguien.
					
					  Como reconoce todo el mundo, EE.UU. es el campeon de este planeta en los ataques de ese tipo y el hacking y el Sur de Corea no es menos culpable en estos temas.
					
					  Efectivamente, los titeres surcoreanos ejercitaron el "ataque cibernetico" anti-RPDC movilizando a muchos especialistas en la computacion durante "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y otros ejercicios belicos conjuntos de varios tipos.
					
					  A pesar de esta realidad, ellos tratan ahora de participar hasta en el "Cyber Storm" mostrando su fachada de maniacos de guerra y elementos proyanquis y conflictivos con la connacional RPDC, que estan empenados en provocar a toda costa una guerra en el territorio patrio en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  La RPDC esta lista para cualquier tipo de la guerra tecnologica de punta.
					
					  El imprudente complot y las maniobras belicistas de la banda de Lee contra la RPDC adelantaran unicamente su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Condenan represion de Lee Myung Bak a publicistas y profesores
articles.content:
Condenan represion de Lee Myung Bak a publicistas y profesores
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la fiscalia titere del Sur de Corea impuso el injusto cargo de "informar noticias tergiversadas" a los publicistas de la cadena "MBC" que revelaron la esencia proyanqui y antipopular de la importacion de de la carne de vacas locas norteamericanas, que impulso forzadamente la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					Entre tanto, "Chongwadae" (Casa Azul) y los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" estan obligando la renuncia general al equipo administrativo de ese medio de prensa.
					
					  Por otra parte, el Ministerio de Educacion, Ciencias y Tecnicas titere amenaza con castigar y acusar a los profesores pertenecientes al Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, que han publicado la declaracion de situacion contra la politica de educacion antidemocratica y la represion a la educacion en pro de la reunificacion de la pandilla de Lee, insistiendo en que ellos cometieron una "violacion de la ley" y se debe tomar una "medida de castigo severo".
					
					  En su declaracion publicada el dia 26, el portavoz del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio condeno categoricamente tales fechorias tildandolas de desafio imperdonable y cruenta represion fascista a los habitantes surcoreanos aspirantes a la nueva politica y nueva vida independientes y democraticas.
					
					  La banda de Lee Myung Bak comenzo su mandato amenazando la vida de los surcoreanos con la carne de vacas locas norteamericanas y establecio el sistema de dictadura fascista reprimiendo cruelmente la justa manifestacion con velas encendidas de ellos, precisa el documento y prosigue:
					
					Ademas, puso al desnudo su origen de opositor a la reunificacion al convertir en letra muerta las historicas declaraciones conjuntas N-S y encarcelar a los habitantes que reclaman la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					  El movimiento por publicar la declaracion de situacion, que se torna infrenable ahora en el Sur de Corea, es la explosion de tantos lamentos e indignacion de los habitantes surcoreanos por la falta de independencia y democracia y el cierre de las posibilidades de la reunificacion, siendo la severa sentencia a la banda del traidor Lee.
					
					  A pesar de esto, esta banda, que todavia no se ha vuelto en si, distorsiona la verdad insultando la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana como "factor del disturbio social" y "violacion de la ley".
					
					  La realidad vuelve a mostrar claramente que si se perdona esa camarilla, no habra el progreso de la sociedad surcoreana ni el mejoramiento de la vida popular ni la esperanza en la reunificacion.

articles.title: FBC condena la enmienda de ley en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FBC condena la enmienda de ley en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ATCC) -- En su declaracion publicada este sabado, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea (FBC) condeno categoricamente los cada dia mas intensivos movimientos de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak para enmendar la "ley de parques naturales" calificandolos de otro grave crimen encaminado a rechazar el budismo y causar enormes percances a los sagrados seminarios.
					  En caso de que entre en vigor la enmienda que plantea la camarilla del traidor Lee a fin de aflojar la regulacion de los parques "nacionales", muchos predios de los templos en ellos se convertiran en el espacio de negocios de las empresas, lo cual significaria la invasion del area de las tradicionales actividades religiosas del circulo budista surcoreano, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Por lo tanto, las pretensiones de revisar esa ley devienen otra muestra de la discriminacion religiosa de los tipejos extremadamente repulsivos al budismo.
					
					El traidor Lee vino insultando, reprimiendo y excluyendo al circulo budista sin perder ninguna oportunidad para hacerlo.
					
					Ultimamente, humillo a los budistas como "amotinados" insistiendo en que eran para el uso de la violencia los palos de bambu preparados por ellos para los funerales del ex "presidente" Roh Moo Hyun.
					
					Si se toma en cuenta estos detalles, no es ninguna sorpresa que los pandilleros de Lee trataran de enmendar a toda costa la "ley de parques naturales" para hacer muchos danos a los templos aunque estan ahora muy atareados por reparar la "situacion politica" perturbada por la sucesiva publicacion de las "declaraciones de situacion" en varios sectores sociales.
					
					  Mientras se mantiene en la "presidencia" ese seudo-presbitero cristiano (Lee Myung Bak) que procuraba "ofrendar al Dios la ciudad de Seul", continuaran la politica de discriminacion religiosa y todas las politicas antipopulares, que depauperan la vida del pueblo.
					
					  Al final, el documento expone la esperanza y la conviccion de que las ordenes y entidades budistas del Sur de Corea se levantaran unanimemente, en firme alianza con los habitantes de diferentes sectores, en la justa lucha por acabar con tales politicas de la horda de Lee.
